column1: You need not to have called me up so late at night
You must be tired after such a long trip
You shouldn't talk back to your parents like that
You shouldn't talk back like that
You shouldn't have eaten so much ice cream
You are right in a way
Have you ever been to America
Fish if you go to America
You had better not work too hard
You don't exert yourself much
You are too much letter-bound
You cannot buy that judge
Have you ever been to that village
I wish you had told me the truth then
Are you on the committee
You should have taken a chance then
Do you know how high the television tower is
You must stick to your promise
You're a philosopher
You had better not associate with those men
You are supposed to come at 7 o'clock
You have to leave home at six
You are expected to come by 5:00
You must be at the station by 5 o'clock
You must be here till five
You look the way your father did thirty years ago
You must keep quiet for a few days
You'll be able to drive a car in a few days
You may as well have a day off
I would rather you had a day off
Can you do it in one day
You should have refused his offer
You need to have breakfast
Did you leave the window open
You should by all means read the book
You should be ashamed of your folly
Are you doing what you think is right
You are the only man in the world that I can call my friend
It is better for you to do it now
You made the mistake on purpose
You had better set some money apart for your wedding
You only started this job an hour ago
Which party do you belong to
You may as well tell me all about it
You may choose either of the two books
You have to report to the police at once
All you have to do is wait on any customers that come to the shop
You can't go naked in this hotel
You must always keep your hands clean
You are always digging at me about my clothes
When did you begin learning German
Please go on with your story
Your story doesn't corroborate what I've heard before
There may be some truth in your story
Your story reminded me of my younger days
Assuming your story is true
Judging from what you say
In the light of what you told us
I can hardly hear you
Omit needless words
Please give me your permanent address
Your parents didn't come
Meg called you during your absence
Your situation is analogous to mine
I understand your position perfectly
If I were in your situation
I think your theory does not hold water
Is there anything you want that you don't have
Your summary is not up to par
He came out shooting
Your prophecy has come true
Your friendship is most precious to me
I admire you for your courage
I admire your courage
I admire your brave deed
I rest on your promise
I'll keep your problems in mind
I see no analogy between your problem and mine
You have lovely eyes
Your eyes are red with crying
Where are your eyes
Your eyes have a certain magnetism
Your driver's license has expired
I will sell the boat in accordance with your orders
Are you sure you want to put your life in her hands
Write your name in capitals
I know your name
Didn't you hear your name called
Your daughter is not a child any more
I admire your ignorance
I have no interest in putting my money into your dreams
This business plan of yours seems almost too optimistic
All I can say is I hope it's more than just wishful thinking
Your dream will come true some day
It won't be long before your dream comes true
The day is sure to come when your dream will come true
The day will surely come when your dream will come true
The time will come when your dream will come true
You have a regular pulse
Tell me about your program for the future
